patthana22.31:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.31:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.31:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.31:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.31:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nonīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.31:9.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ noparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
